Uses of Class
org.revapi.AnalysisContext.Builder

  • Packages that use AnalysisContext.Builder 
    Package Description
    org.revapi  

    • Uses of AnalysisContext.Builder in org.revapi

      Methods in org.revapi that return AnalysisContext.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.builder()
      This method can be used to instantiate a new analysis context builder without the need for prior instantiation of Revapi.
      static AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.builder​(PipelineConfiguration pipelineConfiguration)
      Returns a new analysis context builder that extracts the information about the available extensions from the provided pipeline configuration.
      static AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.builder​(Revapi revapi)
      Returns a new analysis context builder that extracts the information about the available extensions from the provided Revapi instance.
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.mergeConfiguration​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode config)
      Tries to merge the provided configuration into the already existing one.
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.mergeConfiguration​(org.jboss.dmr.ModelNode config)
      Deprecated.
      use the Jackson-based variant
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.mergeConfigurationFromJSON​(String json)  
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.mergeConfigurationFromJSONStream​(InputStream jsonStream)  
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.withConfiguration​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode data)  
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.withConfiguration​(org.jboss.dmr.ModelNode data)
      Deprecated.
      use withConfiguration(JsonNode)
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.withConfigurationFromJSON​(String json)  
      AnalysisContext.Builder AnalysisContext.Builder.withConfigurationFromJSONStream​(InputStream jsonStream)
